DOC.brief_summary: The study single arm single center clinical trials，We conduct phase II clinical trial explore efficacy safety Apatinib chemotherapy sequential treatment advance recurrence metastatic cervical cancer
DOC.brief_title: Apatinib Chemotherapy Sequential Treatment With Cervical Cancer
DOC.criteria: The pathological diagnosis recurrent metastatic cervical cancer ; Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 ; Life expectancy 3months ; With normal marrow , liver renal function： blood routine examination ：HB≥90g/L，ANC ≥1.5×10*9/L，PLT≥80×10*9/L； Biochemical examination : total bilirubin ( TBil ) ≤1.5 upper normal limitation ( UNL ) ，alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) ≤2.5 UNL ≤5 UNL ，acreatinine ( Cr ) ≤ 1.25 UNL ; creatinine clearance rate ≥ 45ml/min ( CockcroftGault ) ; With write informed consent sign voluntarily patient . With good compliance agree accept followup disease progression adverse event . Uncontrolled hypertension Suffered grade II myocardial ischemia myocardial infarction , uncontrolled arrhythmia With abnormal coagulation function， bleed tendency treat thrombolysis anticoagulation History clinically relevant major bleed event ( e.g . gastrointestinal hemorrhage , bleed ulcer , occult blood ≥ ( ++ ) , vasculitis ) = < 3 month prior randomization ; uncured wound fracture Centrally locate tumor local invasion major blood vessel , Researchers think patient may invade important blood vessel cause fatal bleeding ( CT MRI ) ; Factors affect oral medication ( e.g . inability swallow , chronic diarrhea intestinal obstruction ) ; Urine protein > ++ , urine protein 24 hour > 1.0g Accumulation coelomic fluid ( e.g . pleural effusion , ascites fluid , cardiac effusion ) require treatment History uncontrolled psychotropic drug abuse mental disorder ; Prior VEGFR inhibitor treatment ; Other malignancy within Before time basal cell skin cancer , carcinoma situ cervix ;
